com.lrsus.venusdk

Class VENUBroadcast

  • com.lrsus.venusdk.VENUBroadcast

  • public class VENUBroadcast

    Service to provide BLE broadcasting for determining phone position at a location. This should be started once a service number is generated for an app.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  VENUBroadcast.Companion 
      class  VENUBroadcast.VENUBroadcastBinder
      Binder to retrieve VENUBroadcast service.

      Convenience function to generate a intent for the service to stop broadcasting.
